title: 084: These People DON'T Listen to MindPump
description: As the saying goes, you can lead a horse to water but you can't make them drink. MindPump, as you know, is chock-full of valuable training advice, yet some people, who are hungry for this kind of help, don't take the time to listen to the show. What gives? In this episode Sal, Adam and Justin provide actionable advice on how to fit in cardio, even if you have a busy schedule and how to use the 4 stages of learning to catapult your (or your client's) success.
